document_data.name: Myrra
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrra''' was a [[Red Wizard of Thay]] in the [[Doomvault]] dungeon in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Myrra was extremely cruel and liked to toy with her opponents even when she was losing.
document_data.History: Myrra was a Red Wizard assigned to the secret complex of Doomvault located under [[Thaymount]]. She was one of the most loyal and fanatical followers of [[Szass Tam]] and was tasked with the custody of the [[Chosen]] of [[Ghaunadaur]] [[Therzt]] in the deepest levels of the dungeon. Heroes from [[Daggerford]] fought and defeated her in 1486 DR.
